channel.title: Help Please. X(
channel.description: Okay so I'm having some problems with my server. My thieving timer is way to slow. It takes like 10 seconds for you to steal from a stall. Please help I really confused here. :confused:

item.title: Help Please. X(
item.dc:creator: @maxmurks maxmurks
item.description:
@maxmurks wrote:

Okay well I found this. :l

[code]
public int theifTimer = 0;

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int delay, int emote) {

    if (theifTimer == 0) {
        if (playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
            setAnimation(emote);
            sendMessage("You steal from the " + stallName);
            sendMessage(message);
            addItem(item, itemAmount);
            addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
            theifTimer = delay;
        } else if (playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
            sendMessage(
                    "You need a theiving level of " + lvlReq
                    + " to theif from this stall.");[/code]

But as this is the other code I found on the last search.

case 354: TheifStall("secret crate", "and recieve an item", 99, 20 * playerLevel[17], 1631, 1, 40, 0x340); break;
That’s not one of the main stalls, but its got the same problem and the same layout in coding and what not.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 20, 2009, 06:40:08 pm[/size][hr]Any1 know how to fix this.?

Read full topic
